workflow.name: Generate AI website legal and accessibility compliance reports with OpenAI, Gmail and Google Drive
workflow.description:
# Automated Legal & Accessibility Website Compliance Checker

## Description

Automate website compliance checks in minutes using AI-powered analysis.
This workflow scans any website for essential legal and accessibility requirements, generates a professional compliance report, delivers it as a PDF, and stores it securely ‚Äî helping teams identify risks early and stay audit-ready with zero manual effort.

---

## What This Workflow Does

Transforms manual website compliance reviews into a single automated flow:

üåê **Capture Website Details** ‚Äì Accepts website URL, company name, and email via webhook.

üì• **Fetch Website Content** ‚Äì Securely downloads and cleans website HTML for analysis.

üß† **AI Compliance Analysis** ‚Äì Uses AI to audit the site against key compliance standards.

üìä **Scoring & Insights** ‚Äì Calculates an overall compliance score and highlights gaps.

üìÑ **Generate Visual Report** ‚Äì Builds a detailed, easy-to-read HTML compliance report.

üñ®Ô∏è **Convert to PDF** ‚Äì Converts the report into a downloadable, shareable PDF.

üìß **Email Delivery** ‚Äì Sends the compliance report directly to the provided email.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Secure Storage** ‚Äì Saves the PDF report to Google Drive for records and audits.

---

## Key Features

ü§ñ **AI-Powered Compliance Audits** ‚Äì Automatically checks privacy, cookies, accessibility, SSL, and more.

üìä **Compliance Scoring** ‚Äì Clear numerical scores and status indicators for each section.

üìÑ **Professional PDF Reports** ‚Äì Branded, structured reports suitable for clients or audits.

‚öôÔ∏è **End-to-End Automation** ‚Äì From URL submission to email delivery without manual steps.

üìß **Instant Email Notifications** ‚Äì Reports delivered automatically to stakeholders.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive Backup** ‚Äì Centralized storage for compliance history and documentation.

---

## Compliance Checks Included

‚úîÔ∏è Privacy Policy presence & indicators
‚úîÔ∏è Cookie consent mechanisms
‚úîÔ∏è Terms of Service availability
‚úîÔ∏è Accessibility (WCAG-related indicators)
‚úîÔ∏è Contact information visibility
‚úîÔ∏è SSL / HTTPS verification
‚úîÔ∏è Critical issues & improvement recommendations

---

## Perfect For

üè¢ **Startups & SaaS Companies** ‚Äì Quickly assess website compliance before launch.

üßæ **Agencies & Consultants** ‚Äì Deliver automated compliance audits to clients.

‚öñÔ∏è **Legal & Compliance Teams** ‚Äì Speed up preliminary compliance checks.

üíª **Freelancers & Web Developers** ‚Äì Validate client websites post-deployment.

üìà **Operations Teams** ‚Äì Maintain ongoing compliance documentation effortlessly.

---

## What You‚Äôll Need

### Required Integrations

üåê **Webhook** ‚Äì Receive website URL and user details.

ü§ñ **OpenAI** ‚Äì Analyze website HTML for compliance indicators.

üìÑ **HTMLCSS to PDF** ‚Äì Convert compliance report into a PDF.

üìß **Gmail** ‚Äì Send compliance report via email.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive** ‚Äì Store generated compliance reports.

üåç **HTTP Request** ‚Äì Fetch website HTML content (no authentication required).

---

## Optional Enhancements

üìä **Compliance Dashboard** ‚Äì Connect Google Drive or logs to Looker Studio.

üåç **Multi-Website Scans** ‚Äì Extend webhook to accept bulk URLs.

üïí **Scheduled Scans** ‚Äì Run periodic compliance checks automatically.

üì® **Slack Alerts** ‚Äì Send compliance summaries to internal channels.

üìù **Custom Branding** ‚Äì Adjust HTML styling, logos, and colors.

---

## Quick Start

1Ô∏è‚É£ Import the workflow JSON into your n8n workspace.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Activate the webhook and copy the endpoint URL.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Connect OpenAI, Gmail, Google Drive, and HTMLCSS to PDF credentials.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Send a POST request with website URL, company name, and email.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Review the emailed PDF compliance report.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Check Google Drive for stored audit copies.
7Ô∏è‚É£ Activate the workflow for production use.

---

## Expected Results

‚ö° **Minutes Instead of Hours** ‚Äì Instant compliance assessments.

ü§ñ **AI Accuracy** ‚Äì Consistent, structured compliance analysis.

üìà **Risk Visibility** ‚Äì Early detection of legal and accessibility gaps.

üìÑ **Audit-Ready Reports** ‚Äì Clean, shareable documentation.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Centralized Storage** ‚Äì Every scan archived automatically.

---

## Workflow Structure

üåê Webhook Trigger
‚Üì
üì• Fetch Website HTML
‚Üì
üßπ Clean & Prepare Content
‚Üì
üß† AI Compliance Analysis
‚Üì
üìä Parse Results
‚Üì
üìÑ Generate HTML Report
‚Üì
üñ®Ô∏è Convert to PDF
‚Üì
üìß Email Report
‚Üì
‚òÅÔ∏è Save to Google Drive

---

## Ready to Automate Website Compliance?

Import this template and turn any website URL into a complete compliance report ‚Äî automatically, consistently, and professionally.
Perfect for audits, clients, and peace of mind. ‚úÖ

---

values.content:
=     You are a website compliance auditor. Analyze the provided website HTML and check for:
     
     1. Privacy Policy (presence, accessibility, GDPR/CCPA compliance indicators)
     2. Cookie Consent (banner, management options)
     3. Terms of Service
     4. Accessibility (WCAG indicators like alt text, ARIA labels)
     5. Contact Information (required in many jurisdictions)
     6. SSL Certificate (from URL)
     7. Data Protection Officer mention (for GDPR)
     
     Return ONLY a valid JSON object with this exact structure:
     {
       "privacy_policy": {"found": true/false, "score": 0-100, "details": "string"},
       "cookie_consent": {"found": true/false, "score": 0-100, "details": "string"},
       "terms_of_service": {"found": true/false, "score": 0-100, "details": "string"},
       "accessibility": {"score": 0-100, "details": "string", "issues": ["string"]},
       "contact_info": {"found": true/false, "details": "string"},
       "ssl_enabled": true/false,
       "overall_score": 0-100,
       "critical_issues": ["string"],
       "recommendations": ["string"]
     }

üìä Quick Summary:

Privacy Policy {{ $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.privacy_policy.found ? '‚úì Found' : '‚úó Missing' }}
Cookie Consent {{ $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.cookie_consent.found ? '‚úì Found' : '‚úó Missing' }}
Terms of Service {{ $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.terms_of_service.found ? '‚úì Found' : '‚úó Missing' }}
Accessibility Score {{$('Generate HTML Report').item.json.accessibility.score}}/100
SSL Certificate {{ $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.ssl_enabled ? '‚úì Enabled' : '‚úó Not Detected' }}
{{$('Generate HTML Report').item.json.critical_issues && $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.critical_issues.length > 0 ? '
‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Issues Detected:
    ' + $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.critical_issues.map(issue => '
  • ' + issue + '
    • ').join('') + '
' : '' }}

üìé Please find the detailed PDF report attached to this email with complete analysis and recommendations.

This is an automated compliance scan powered by AI.
For legal compliance advice, please consult with a qualified attorney.
parameters.subject: =üîí Website Compliance Report - {{ $('Generate HTML Report').item.json.company_name }}

parameters.content:
### How it works
This workflow automatically audits websites for legal compliance. It receives a website URL via webhook, fetches and cleans the HTML content, uses OpenAI to analyze compliance across privacy policies, cookie consent, terms of service, accessibility (WCAG), SSL certificates, and contact information. The AI generates a comprehensive compliance report with scores and recommendations, converts it to PDF, emails it to the requester, and saves a copy to Google Drive for record-keeping.

### Setup steps
Connect these credentials before running:
* **OpenAI** - Analyze website compliance
* **HTMLCSS to PDF** - Convert reports to PDF
* **Gmail** - Send compliance reports
* **Google Drive** - Store PDF reports

### Customization
Modify AI compliance criteria in "Analyze Compliance" node system prompt. Customize HTML report design in "Generate HTML Report" node. Adjust PDF styling via HTMLCSS to PDF settings. Configure email templates in "Send Compliance Report" for branded messaging.

## Input & Website Scan
Webhook receives website URL, company name, and email. Fetches HTML content and cleans it for AI analysis.

## Report Generation
Builds professional HTML compliance report with scores and recommendations, then converts to downloadable PDF.

## AI Compliance Analysis
OpenAI checks privacy policy, cookies, terms, SSL, accessibility, and contact info. Generates scores and identifies critical issues.

## Delivery & Storage
Emails PDF report to user and saves copy to Google Drive for auditing and legal review purposes.

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.
